about_the_game: Rebuild the Calendar of Selardi to experience Werewolf: The Apocalypse — The Book of Hungry Names as one of the relentless hunters of the Galestalkers or as a member of the secretive and ruthless Ghost Council. Even if you don’t join one of those tribes, use the Calendar to unlock more Gifts once you swear yourself to a Patron Spirit. Unlock entirely new Gifts that let you steal magic from your enemies with Crow, shatter mystic bonds with the Hummingbird Prince, or call down lightning with the Stormcat.
